title: 283: Fifty Roles
description: The many roles we need to juggle as independent developers, and considering which roles we can take off our plates.

#283: Fifty Roles

December 9th, 2023 · 29 minutes

The many roles we need to juggle as independent developers, and considering which roles we can take off our plates.

This episode of Under the Radar is sponsored by:
